mapper.select: SELECT branch_no AS branchNo, branch_name AS branchName, branch_address AS branchAddress, branch_tel AS branchTel FROM branch
SELECT branch_no branchNo, branch_name branchName, FROM branch

SELECT b.branch_no branchNo FROM branch b INNER JOIN employee e ON b.branch_no = e.branch_no INNER JOIN program p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id INNER JOIN program_date pd ON p.program_no = pd.program_no WHERE program_date_no = #{programDateNo}
